name: 3 seconds out of time - (CFGJ9)
description:
This is our first game jam project for the Construct French Game Jam 9 (CFGJ9).

The game was made with Construct 3 by :

  • Ghinks (Developpement)
  • MythranDouze (Art)

The source for the two musics used in the game : https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev

The theme was "Timeloop" so we thought of a game were the main character can use his own corpses to solve puzzles.

Use the keyboard arrows to play.
